DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , placebo- open-label active control , parallel-group , multicenter , dose range study male female subject age 12 year old persistent asthma uncontrolled non-steroidal therapy . The primary objective study evaluate dose response , efficacy safety 4 different dos fluticasone propionate ( dose 1 , dose 2 , dose 3 , dose 4 ) deliver Fluticasone Propionate DPI ( Dry Powder Inhaler ) administer twice daily .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Effectiveness Safety Different Doses Fluticasone Propionate Taken From Dry Powder Inhaler Adolescents Adults Who Have Asthma That Not Controlled Asthma Medications Not Containing Steroids
